      • getSubstitutes

        public java.util.Vector<SubstituteTeacher> getSubstitutes(ScheduleObject s)
        Finds the substitutes for this teacher and for the date selected in schedule. Days of week are represented from index 0 to 6 (from monday to sunday) In french calendar, monday is 2. It's the reason why we decrement the date by 2.
        Parameters:
        s - schedule object
        Returns:
        a list of teachers
